source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_SEQ_00<tab>The Radiant Host soldier has a message for the Scions of the Seventh Dawn.
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_SEQ_00<tab>У солдата Отряда Сиятельных есть сообщение для Хранителей Седьмого рассвета.

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the Radiant Host soldier.
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_TODO_00<tab>Поговорите с солдатом Сиятельных.

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_TODO_01<tab>Speak with the Radiant Host soldier again.
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_TODO_01<tab>Снова поговорите с солдатом Сиятельных.

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_TODO_02<tab>Speak with the Radiant Host soldier.
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_TODO_02<tab>Поговорите с солдатом Сиятельных.

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_TODO_03<tab>Speak with the Radiant Host soldier again.
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_TODO_03<tab>Снова поговорите с солдатом Сиятельных.

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_TODO_04<tab>Speak with Mihleel.
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_TODO_04<tab>Поговорите с Мифлил.

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_TODO_05<tab>Speak with Y'shtola.
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_TODO_05<tab>Поговорите с Я'штолой.

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_TODO_06<tab>Speak with Thancred.
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_TODO_06<tab>Поговорите с Танкредом.

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_ALPHINAUD_000_000<tab>No matter what my father and the Forum say, giving up and abandoning this place cannot be our only recourse!
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_ALPHINAUD_000_000<tab>Не важно, что говорят отец и Форум! Сдаться и бросить всё - это последнее средство!

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_ALISAIE_000_005<tab>We have no better, safer course of action to offer them than fleeing to the moon. I know this. And yet, Vrtra and his people love their home. There must be something we can do...
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_ALISAIE_000_005<tab>Лучшего и более безопасного выхода из ситуации, кроме как сбежать на луну, я не вижу. Мы все это знаем. Но Вритра и его народ любят свой дом. Мы просто обязаны что-то сделать...

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_THANCRED_000_010<tab>Their solution sits ill with me. But if life has taught me anything, it's that there is little to be gained from arguing with Sharlayans. We must take it upon ourselves to find a better way.
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_THANCRED_000_010<tab>Их решение проблем мне вовсе не по нраву. Но если жизнь меня чему и научила, так это тому, что спорить с шарлеанцами бесполезно. Теперь на наши плечи ложится этот груз.

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_YSHTOLA_000_015<tab>Even were Vrtra to acquiesce to their proposal, just how do the Sharlayans intend to transport the nation's entire populace to the moon?
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_YSHTOLA_000_015<tab>Даже если бы Вритра согласился с предложением, как шарлеанцы намерены переправить людей целой нации на луну?..

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_GRAHATIA_000_020<tab>That soldier of the Radiant there─if I am not mistaken, he accompanied Ahewann to Vanaspati. Could it be that he knew Vrtra's identity all along...?
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_GRAHATIA_000_020<tab>Тот боец Сиятельных - если не ошибаюсь, он был с Ахеванном в Ванаспати. Интересно, он знал о Вритре всё это время?..

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_ESTINIEN_000_025<tab>Under normal circumstances, the Forum's proposal would be regarded as sheer madness. But when the sky burns, even madness can sound appealing.
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_ESTINIEN_000_025<tab>В нормальных обстоятельствах на членов Форума с такими заявлениями на устах глядели бы, как на безумцев. Но небо в огне, и теперь все готовы ухватиться даже за такую соломинку.

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_ESTINIEN_000_026<tab>Doubtless Vrtra is loath to abandon his home. And yet, absent other options, he cannot dismiss the option out of hand...
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_ESTINIEN_000_026<tab>Не сомневаюсь, Вритре вовсе не хочется оставлять свой дом. Вариантов не то чтобы много, и от этого ему лучше не торопиться отказываться...

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_HANNISHROYALGUARD_000_030<tab>Greetings, honored Scions of the Seventh Dawn. I have a message from His Excellency the satrap.
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_HANNISHROYALGUARD_000_030<tab>Приветствую, почётные Хранители Седьмого рассвета. У меня для вас послание от его сиятельства сатрапа.

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_HANNISHROYALGUARD_000_031<tab>“Brave Scions. You have my gratitude for aiding my people in this most trying of times.
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_HANNISHROYALGUARD_000_031<tab>«Храбрые Хранители. Благодарю вас за помощь моим людям в это самое тёмное из времён».

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_HANNISHROYALGUARD_000_032<tab>“Alas, matters here at Meghaduta prevent me from meeting you all in person.
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_HANNISHROYALGUARD_000_032<tab>«Увы, дела в Мегхадуте не позволят мне встретиться с вами лично».

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_HANNISHROYALGUARD_000_033<tab>“As a token of mine appreciation, I have arranged for a feast to be held in your honor. May it nourish you in preparation for the trials ahead.”
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_HANNISHROYALGUARD_000_033<tab>«Но в знак признательности я собираюсь устроить пир в вашу честь. Пусть он насытит вас сейчас и на будущее - перед новыми испытаниями».

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_HANNISHROYALGUARD_000_034<tab>...Such are the words of Master Vrtra. The feast he speaks of awaits you at Mehryde's Meyhane. Pray make your way there whenever your business here is done.
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_HANNISHROYALGUARD_000_034<tab>...Таковыми были слова господина Вритры. Пир, о котором шла речь, будет ждать вас в "Ресторане Мехриды". Прошу, отправляйтесь сразу туда, как только ваши дела здесь будут закончены.

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_ALPHINAUD_000_035<tab>We thank you for your kindness. Indeed, I was hoping we might find a place to discuss our next course of action, and that seems an ideal venue.
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_ALPHINAUD_000_035<tab>Спасибо за вашу доброту. Действительно, я надеялся подыскать местечко, где мы могли бы обсудить наши с товарищами дальнейшие действия, а сейчас шанс подворачивается сам собой.

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_HANNISHROYALGUARD_000_036<tab>Ah, and to you, <var 29 EB02 /var>. There is someone we had hoped to introduce to you in particular.
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_HANNISHROYALGUARD_000_036<tab>И насчёт вас, <var 29 EB02 /var>. Есть кое-кто, кого мы хотели бы вам представить.

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_HANNISHROYALGUARD_000_037<tab>While I am loath to detain you further, might you spare a moment of your time?
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_HANNISHROYALGUARD_000_037<tab>Мне правда не хотелось бы и дальше вас донимать, но... разрешите занять вас ненадолго?

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_ALISAIE_000_038<tab>A personal invitation, knowing full well your services are in the highest demand right now? This must be important. Worry not─we'll save some food for you, so take all the time you need.
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_ALISAIE_000_038<tab>Личное приглашение от кого-то? Притом, что все знают, насколько ты сейчас занят<var 08 E905 ((а)) (()) /var>? Должно быть, это очень важно. Не переживай, мы оставим тебе немного еды. Так что... не торопись.

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_HANNISHROYALGUARD_000_039<tab>Thank you, friend. Whenever you are ready, please join me in the aetheryte plaza. I shall go on ahead.
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_HANNISHROYALGUARD_000_039<tab>Спасибо вам большое. Когда будете готовы, встретимся на эфиритовой площади. Оттуда мне приказано сопроводить вас.

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_HANNISHROYALGUARD_000_050<tab>Access to the aetheryte you see there has been restricted to a select few ever since the tower first appeared.
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_HANNISHROYALGUARD_000_050<tab>Доступ к эфириту, который вы видите, был запрещён всем, кроме горстки избранных - с того самого момента, как появилась башни.

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_HANNISHROYALGUARD_000_051<tab>We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience, but it was deemed too dangerous to permit the free movement of visitors at a time of emergency─a risk we could not take.
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_HANNISHROYALGUARD_000_051<tab>Мы искренне просим прощения за возникшие неудобства... но было решено ограничить свободное перемещение гостей в период повышенной готовности - риски слишком велики.

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_HANNISHROYALGUARD_000_052<tab>In light of recent developments, however, the satrap has decided that such restrictions would only hinder our efforts to combat the Final Days.
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_HANNISHROYALGUARD_000_052<tab>В свете последних событий, однако, сатрап постановил, что подобные ограничения только помешают сражению на фронте Последних Дней.

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_HANNISHROYALGUARD_000_053<tab>As such, I would encourage you to attune with the aetheryte before proceeding along the corridor.
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_HANNISHROYALGUARD_000_053<tab>Поэтому предлагаю вам не откладывая в долгий ящик настроиться на данный эфирит перед тем, как пройти дальше по коридору.

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_HANNISHROYALGUARD_000_060<tab>Ah, you must be wondering what this place is.
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_HANNISHROYALGUARD_000_060<tab>Ага, вы должно быть гадаете, что это за место?

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_HANNISHROYALGUARD_000_061<tab>You stand in the Hall of the Radiant Host, from where our leadership oversees all of Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han's military operations.
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_HANNISHROYALGUARD_000_061<tab>Мы в Ставке Сиятельных, нашей штаб-квартире, откуда наши лидеры контролируют все военные операции Радз<var 1F /var>ат<var 1F /var>Хана.

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_HANNISHROYALGUARD_000_062<tab>Sundrop, our destination, lies just ahead.
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_HANNISHROYALGUARD_000_062<tab>Наш пункт назначения, "Закат", впереди.

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_SHIRABAHT_000_070<tab>Ah, so <var 1A 02 /var>you're<var 1A 01 /var> the one I've heard so much about?
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_SHIRABAHT_000_070<tab>Ага, так это вы - <var 08 E905 ((та)) ((тот)) /var>, о ком мы столько слышали?

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_RESIDENTOFFICER_000_075<tab>Wait, I know you! Ah, but forgive me. Idle chatter can wait.
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_RESIDENTOFFICER_000_075<tab>Стойте, я вас знаю! О, но простите. Болтовня подождёт.

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_LIMSARESIDENTOFFICIAL_000_080<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! We've been waiting for you!
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_LIMSARESIDENTOFFICIAL_000_080<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Мы вас ждали!

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_ULDAHMILITARYATTACHE_000_085<tab>Well, look who we have here! Word of your deeds in Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han has reached the sultanate, so you know.
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_ULDAHMILITARYATTACHE_000_085<tab>Вы только поглядите, кто здесь! Вести о ваших делах в ханнстве достигли султаната, так и знайте.

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_ALAMHIGOMILITARYATTACHE_000_090<tab>The liberator of Ala Mhigo is always a welcome sight. If I can be of service in any way, just ask.
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_ALAMHIGOMILITARYATTACHE_000_090<tab>Освободитель<var 08 E905 ((ница)) (()) /var> Ала Миго - всегда рады! Если я могу чем-нибудь служить, просто скажите.

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_ISHGARDRESIDENTOFFICER_000_095<tab>...Hm? Ah, sorry...I was─ Oh, <var 29 EB02 /var>! Ishgard remembers, let there be no doubt. The Fury favors us this day, that we may stand in the presence of a true hero.
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_ISHGARDRESIDENTOFFICER_000_095<tab>...А? Простите, я... Ой, <var 29 EB02 /var>! Ишгард помнит, не сомневайтесь. Яростная к нам благосклонна, раз уж <var 08 E905 ((истинная героиня почтила)) ((истинный герой почтил)) /var> нас сегодня своим присутствием.

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_DOMANRESIDENTOFFICER_000_100<tab>To think I would meet Doma's savior here, in this distant land...
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_DOMANRESIDENTOFFICER_000_100<tab>Надо же! Встретиться со спасител<var 08 E905 ((ьницей)) ((ем)) /var> Домы здесь, в этих далёких землях...

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_HANNISHROYALGUARD_000_110<tab>Welcome to Sundrop. Without further ado, allow me to introduce you to─
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_HANNISHROYALGUARD_000_110<tab>Добро пожаловать в "Закат". На затягивая, позвольте сразу же вас представить...

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_SHIRABAHT_000_111<tab>Oho! So you're the famous <var 29 EB02 /var>, eh? I knew it the moment you stepped through the door! You've the look of one who's walked through hell!
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_SHIRABAHT_000_111<tab>Oho! So you're the famous <var 29 EB02 /var>, eh? I knew it the moment you stepped through the door! You've the look of one who's walked through hell!

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_HANNISHROYALGUARD_000_112<tab>Shirabaht, please! You are speaking to the satrap's honored guest and a savior of our people. Can you not show a modicum of respect?
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_HANNISHROYALGUARD_000_112<tab>Shirabaht, please! You are speaking to the satrap's honored guest and a savior of our people. Can you not show a modicum of respect?

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_SHIRABAHT_000_113<tab>What disrespect is there in paying a fellow warrior a compliment? We're all friends here, or will be soon enough.
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_SHIRABAHT_000_113<tab>What disrespect is there in paying a fellow warrior a compliment? We're all friends here, or will be soon enough.

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_SHIRABAHT_000_114<tab>More formally, then, for the benefit of my countryman. It is a pleasure to have you with us, O great Champion of Eorzea, Scion of the Seventh Dawn, Warrior of Light, and all-round good egg, I'm sure.
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_SHIRABAHT_000_114<tab>More formally, then, for the benefit of my countryman. It is a pleasure to have you with us, O great Champion of Eorzea, Scion of the Seventh Dawn, Warrior of Light, and all-round good egg, I'm sure.

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_Q1_000_115<tab>What will you ask?
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_Q1_000_115<tab>What will you ask?

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_A1_000_116<tab>What is this place?
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_A1_000_116<tab>What is this place?

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_A1_000_117<tab>Who are you?
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_A1_000_117<tab>Who are you?

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_A1_000_118<tab>This talk of eggs reminds me I'm late for dinner...
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_A1_000_118<tab>This talk of eggs reminds me I'm late for dinner...

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_SHIRABAHT_000_119<tab>I hear you've been to Kugane, where you'll have seen all sorts of foreign embassies and whatnot.
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_SHIRABAHT_000_119<tab>I hear you've been to Kugane, where you'll have seen all sorts of foreign embassies and whatnot.

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_SHIRABAHT_000_120<tab>Well, we've got them here in Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han, too. Other lands send delegates to oversee trade and diplomatic dealings. Then there are military matters to discuss, which is why all these officers are stationed here in Sundrop.
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_SHIRABAHT_000_120<tab>Well, we've got them here in Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han, too. Other lands send delegates to oversee trade and diplomatic dealings. Then there are military matters to discuss, which is why all these officers are stationed here in Sundrop.

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_SHIRABAHT_000_121<tab>A fool with too many scars and knees that ache in the winter! The name's Shirabaht, and I attend to business here. As for what sort of business, how can I put it...?
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_SHIRABAHT_000_121<tab>A fool with too many scars and knees that ache in the winter! The name's Shirabaht, and I attend to business here. As for what sort of business, how can I put it...?

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_SHIRABAHT_000_122<tab>Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han welcomes delegates from other lands to oversee trade and diplomatic dealings. Then there are military matters to discuss, which is why all these officers are stationed here in Sundrop.
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_SHIRABAHT_000_122<tab>Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han welcomes delegates from other lands to oversee trade and diplomatic dealings. Then there are military matters to discuss, which is why all these officers are stationed here in Sundrop.

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_SHIRABAHT_000_123<tab>Bahahaha! A <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> after my own heart! I like that!
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_SHIRABAHT_000_123<tab>Bahahaha! A <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> after my own heart! I like that!

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_SHIRABAHT_000_124<tab>Don't you worry─I'll keep it short. There's just a thing or two we'd like you to remember. First of all, about the room you're standing in now...
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_SHIRABAHT_000_124<tab>Don't you worry─I'll keep it short. There's just a thing or two we'd like you to remember. First of all, about the room you're standing in now...

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_SHIRABAHT_000_125<tab>Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han welcomes delegates from other lands to oversee trade and diplomatic dealings. Then there are military matters to discuss, which is why all these officers are stationed here in Sundrop.
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_SHIRABAHT_000_125<tab>Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han welcomes delegates from other lands to oversee trade and diplomatic dealings. Then there are military matters to discuss, which is why all these officers are stationed here in Sundrop.

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_SHIRABAHT_000_126<tab>I imagine you're more than familiar with each of the nations they represent, yes?
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_SHIRABAHT_000_126<tab>I imagine you're more than familiar with each of the nations they represent, yes?

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_SHIRABAHT_000_127<tab>We've got representatives from Doma...
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_SHIRABAHT_000_127<tab>We've got representatives from Doma...

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_SHIRABAHT_000_128<tab>Ul'dah and Ala Mhigo...
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_SHIRABAHT_000_128<tab>Ul'dah and Ala Mhigo...

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_SHIRABAHT_000_129<tab>Limsa Lominsa...
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_SHIRABAHT_000_129<tab>Limsa Lominsa...

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_SHIRABAHT_000_130<tab>Gridania...
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_SHIRABAHT_000_130<tab>Gridania...

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_SHIRABAHT_000_131<tab>And last─but never let it be said least─Ishgard. They're the eyes, ears, and mouths that bridge the distance between Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han and their respective homelands.
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_SHIRABAHT_000_131<tab>And last─but never let it be said least─Ishgard. They're the eyes, ears, and mouths that bridge the distance between Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han and their respective homelands.

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_SHIRABAHT_000_132<tab>We've used this brief respite to share the details of our plight with our overseas counterparts.
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_SHIRABAHT_000_132<tab>We've used this brief respite to share the details of our plight with our overseas counterparts.

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_SHIRABAHT_000_133<tab>And wouldn't you know it, all of their leaders requested a few words from you specifically. You're a <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> in high demand, eh?
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_SHIRABAHT_000_133<tab>And wouldn't you know it, all of their leaders requested a few words from you specifically. You're a <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> in high demand, eh?

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_SHIRABAHT_000_134<tab>And so, would you mind regaling us with your own account? Indulge us before you indulge yourself.
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_SHIRABAHT_000_134<tab>And so, would you mind regaling us with your own account? Indulge us before you indulge yourself.

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_LIMSARESIDENTOFFICIAL_000_135<tab>I thank you for the report. The conditions under which men are turned to beasts, the aetheric anomalies you have observed...you have given us much to consider.
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_LIMSARESIDENTOFFICIAL_000_135<tab>I thank you for the report. The conditions under which men are turned to beasts, the aetheric anomalies you have observed...you have given us much to consider.

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_LIMSARESIDENTOFFICIAL_000_136<tab>It is concerning that the first transformation apparently occurred before the skies turned red. 'Tis contrary to what one would expect...
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_LIMSARESIDENTOFFICIAL_000_136<tab>It is concerning that the first transformation apparently occurred before the skies turned red. 'Tis contrary to what one would expect...

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_ISHGARDRESIDENTOFFICER_000_137<tab>Thankfully, the information you conveyed to Lucia upon your return from the moon has already proved invaluable.
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_ISHGARDRESIDENTOFFICER_000_137<tab>Thankfully, the information you conveyed to Lucia upon your return from the moon has already proved invaluable.

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_ISHGARDRESIDENTOFFICER_000_138<tab>As soon as reports of the calamity here in Thavnair reached the Grand Company of Eorzea and our Far Eastern allies, our leaders knew at once that the Final Days were indeed upon us. They began taking steps to assess the extent of the phenomenon's spread.
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_ISHGARDRESIDENTOFFICER_000_138<tab>As soon as reports of the calamity here in Thavnair reached the Grand Company of Eorzea and our Far Eastern allies, our leaders knew at once that the Final Days were indeed upon us. They began taking steps to assess the extent of the phenomenon's spread.

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_ISHGARDRESIDENTOFFICER_000_139<tab>Our agents were able to confirm that, for the time being, the skies burn only over the Bounty, including this island and Corvos.
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_ISHGARDRESIDENTOFFICER_000_139<tab>Our agents were able to confirm that, for the time being, the skies burn only over the Bounty, including this island and Corvos.

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_ISHGARDRESIDENTOFFICER_000_140<tab>Alas, that is of little comfort...
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_ISHGARDRESIDENTOFFICER_000_140<tab>Alas, that is of little comfort...

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_RESIDENTOFFICER_000_141<tab>Aye. All throughout allied lands, there have been reports of people transforming into hideous beasts.
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_RESIDENTOFFICER_000_141<tab>Aye. All throughout allied lands, there have been reports of people transforming into hideous beasts.

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_RESIDENTOFFICER_000_142<tab>From what little we have learned, these incidents are similar in nature to that involving the merchant Khalzahl.
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_RESIDENTOFFICER_000_142<tab>From what little we have learned, these incidents are similar in nature to that involving the merchant Khalzahl.

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_RESIDENTOFFICER_000_143<tab>As was the case here, the victims underwent the change prior to the heavens being set ablaze.
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_RESIDENTOFFICER_000_143<tab>As was the case here, the victims underwent the change prior to the heavens being set ablaze.

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_RESIDENTOFFICER_000_144<tab>And so, while the burning skies have yet to manifest beyond the Bounty, the transformations do not appear to be subject to any similar restriction. If anyone anywhere overcome by despair can turn, then nowhere is safe!
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_RESIDENTOFFICER_000_144<tab>And so, while the burning skies have yet to manifest beyond the Bounty, the transformations do not appear to be subject to any similar restriction. If anyone anywhere overcome by despair can turn, then nowhere is safe!

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_SHIRABAHT_000_145<tab>That's about the size of it. Speaking of which, we ought to give these creatures a name, don't you think?
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_SHIRABAHT_000_145<tab>That's about the size of it. Speaking of which, we ought to give these creatures a name, don't you think?

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_SHIRABAHT_000_146<tab>Here in Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han, we've taken to calling the first to change─which tend to be the biggest─“blasphemies.”
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_SHIRABAHT_000_146<tab>Here in Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han, we've taken to calling the first to change─which tend to be the biggest─“blasphemies.”

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_RESIDENTOFFICER_000_147<tab>As fitting a name as any. To ensure clarity in future communications, we shall urge our comrades to adopt this terminology.
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_RESIDENTOFFICER_000_147<tab>As fitting a name as any. To ensure clarity in future communications, we shall urge our comrades to adopt this terminology.

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_ULDAHMILITARYATTACHE_000_148<tab>Our leaders have taken measures to deal with the threat, to the best of our abilities.
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_ULDAHMILITARYATTACHE_000_148<tab>Our leaders have taken measures to deal with the threat, to the best of our abilities.

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_ALAMHIGOMILITARYATTACHE_000_149<tab>Aye. Each nation has assembled their own groups of elite soldiers to put down these so-called blasphemies and their spawn as and when they appear.
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_ALAMHIGOMILITARYATTACHE_000_149<tab>Aye. Each nation has assembled their own groups of elite soldiers to put down these so-called blasphemies and their spawn as and when they appear.

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_ALAMHIGOMILITARYATTACHE_000_150<tab>At the same time, they are doing all in their power to put the people's minds at ease, and prevent panic and fear from spreading.
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_ALAMHIGOMILITARYATTACHE_000_150<tab>At the same time, they are doing all in their power to put the people's minds at ease, and prevent panic and fear from spreading.

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_ALAMHIGOMILITARYATTACHE_000_151<tab>That said...brave souls with the strength and fortitude to fell these terrible fiends are not easily found.
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_ALAMHIGOMILITARYATTACHE_000_151<tab>That said...brave souls with the strength and fortitude to fell these terrible fiends are not easily found.

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_DOMANRESIDENTOFFICER_000_152<tab>Just so. And it is for that very reason that we turn to you.
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_DOMANRESIDENTOFFICER_000_152<tab>Just so. And it is for that very reason that we turn to you.

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_DOMANRESIDENTOFFICER_000_153<tab>Pray lend us your strength, and help us to slay the blasphemies that plague our homelands!
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_DOMANRESIDENTOFFICER_000_153<tab>Pray lend us your strength, and help us to slay the blasphemies that plague our homelands!

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_SHIRABAHT_000_154<tab>Now, now...you don't have to give your reply before dinner. I should also mention that each blasphemy seems to possess wildly different characteristics. What works well against one may serve you poorly against another.
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_SHIRABAHT_000_154<tab>Now, now...you don't have to give your reply before dinner. I should also mention that each blasphemy seems to possess wildly different characteristics. What works well against one may serve you poorly against another.

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_SHIRABAHT_000_155<tab>So before you go rushing off to save everyone's day, have a word with the delegates. They'll tell you what to expect.
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_SHIRABAHT_000_155<tab>So before you go rushing off to save everyone's day, have a word with the delegates. They'll tell you what to expect.

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_SHIRABAHT_000_156<tab>...And with that, I do believe our friend here has a feast to attend. Spare a thought for us while you're tucking into all that fine cuisine, eh?
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_SHIRABAHT_000_156<tab>...And with that, I do believe our friend here has a feast to attend. Spare a thought for us while you're tucking into all that fine cuisine, eh?

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_SYSTEM_000_157<tab>You have gained access to the role quests for Endwalker! A separate quest line and story is now available for tank, melee DPS, physical ranged DPS, magical ranged DPS, and healer roles.
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_SYSTEM_000_157<tab>You have gained access to the role quests for Endwalker! A separate quest line and story is now available for tank, melee DPS, physical ranged DPS, magical ranged DPS, and healer roles.

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_SYSTEM_000_158<tab>To undertake these quests, speak with any of the delegates in Sundrop, and agree to help defeat the blasphemies that plague their respective homelands.
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_SYSTEM_000_158<tab>To undertake these quests, speak with any of the delegates in Sundrop, and agree to help defeat the blasphemies that plague their respective homelands.

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_SHIRABAHT_000_160<tab>Thanks for taking the time to stop by. You're free to talk with our delegates more if the mood strikes you, or head off to your banquet if you've had your fill of words for the day.
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_SHIRABAHT_000_160<tab>Thanks for taking the time to stop by. You're free to talk with our delegates more if the mood strikes you, or head off to your banquet if you've had your fill of words for the day.

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_SHIRABAHT_000_161<tab>Ridding the lands of blasphemies is an important task, to be sure, but one that's best done on a full belly and a good night's rest, if you ask me. Do take care of yourself, you hear?
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_SHIRABAHT_000_161<tab>Ridding the lands of blasphemies is an important task, to be sure, but one that's best done on a full belly and a good night's rest, if you ask me. Do take care of yourself, you hear?

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_HANNISHROYALGUARD_000_170<tab>Pray forgive Shirabaht her rudeness. She can be a bit...boisterous at times, but it is simply her nature.
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_HANNISHROYALGUARD_000_170<tab>Pray forgive Shirabaht her rudeness. She can be a bit...boisterous at times, but it is simply her nature.

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_HANNISHROYALGUARD_000_171<tab>Anyway, my apologies for keeping you from your hard-earned rest. You will be rejoining your companions, yes? Do you know the way to the meyhane?
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_HANNISHROYALGUARD_000_171<tab>Anyway, my apologies for keeping you from your hard-earned rest. You will be rejoining your companions, yes? Do you know the way to the meyhane?

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_Q2_000_172<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_Q2_000_172<tab>What will you say?

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_A2_000_173<tab>I know Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han like the back of my hand!
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_A2_000_173<tab>I know Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han like the back of my hand!

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_A2_000_174<tab>I have a terrible sense of direction.
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_A2_000_174<tab>I have a terrible sense of direction.

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_HANNISHROYALGUARD_000_175<tab>Glad to hear you're becoming familiar with our fair city. You'll be pleased to hear that all drinks are on the house, so order whatever suits your fancy.
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_HANNISHROYALGUARD_000_175<tab>Glad to hear you're becoming familiar with our fair city. You'll be pleased to hear that all drinks are on the house, so order whatever suits your fancy.

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_HANNISHROYALGUARD_000_176<tab>Truly? A remarkable weakness for such a well-traveled adventurer. Anyway, you can either use the Aethernet, or go by foot via the aetheryte plaza.
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_HANNISHROYALGUARD_000_176<tab>Truly? A remarkable weakness for such a well-traveled adventurer. Anyway, you can either use the Aethernet, or go by foot via the aetheryte plaza.

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_HANNISHROYALGUARD_000_177<tab>From there, cross through Balshahn Bazaar and continue down the passage. You'll find yourself right in front of the meyhane.
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_HANNISHROYALGUARD_000_177<tab>From there, cross through Balshahn Bazaar and continue down the passage. You'll find yourself right in front of the meyhane.

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_HANNISHROYALGUARD_000_178<tab>When you arrive, pray request the drink of your choice. Mehryde says that, tonight, it's on the house.
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_HANNISHROYALGUARD_000_178<tab>When you arrive, pray request the drink of your choice. Mehryde says that, tonight, it's on the house.

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_HANNISHROYALGUARD_000_179<tab>And with that, I must return to my post. On behalf of all the Radiant Host, I thank you and your friends once more for lending your strength and courage to Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han in our time of need.
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_HANNISHROYALGUARD_000_179<tab>And with that, I must return to my post. On behalf of all the Radiant Host, I thank you and your friends once more for lending your strength and courage to Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han in our time of need.

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_HANNISHROYALGUARD_000_180<tab>We shall endeavor to fight the good fight to the end, that we might honor Ahewann's legacy and serve Master Vrtra well. You have my word that your efforts will not be in vain.
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_HANNISHROYALGUARD_000_180<tab>We shall endeavor to fight the good fight to the end, that we might honor Ahewann's legacy and serve Master Vrtra well. You have my word that your efforts will not be in vain.

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_ALPHINAUD_000_190<tab>Forgive me for not waiting to make a toast. My throat was utterly parched...
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_ALPHINAUD_000_190<tab>Forgive me for not waiting to make a toast. My throat was utterly parched...

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_ALISAIE_000_195<tab>I know I must eat to regain my strength, but between you and me, I don't have much of an appetite.
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_ALISAIE_000_195<tab>I know I must eat to regain my strength, but between you and me, I don't have much of an appetite.

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_THANCRED_000_200<tab>The threat here has been quelled, but our job's only just begun...
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_THANCRED_000_200<tab>The threat here has been quelled, but our job's only just begun...

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_YSHTOLA_000_205<tab>Good you could join us. Mihleel over there will be happy to take your order.
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_YSHTOLA_000_205<tab>Good you could join us. Mihleel over there will be happy to take your order.

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_GRAHATIA_000_210<tab>How was your meeting with the Radiant? I would love to hear more...
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_GRAHATIA_000_210<tab>How was your meeting with the Radiant? I would love to hear more...

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_ESTINIEN_000_215<tab>I'm overdue for a good meal.
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_ESTINIEN_000_215<tab>I'm overdue for a good meal.

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_MIHLEEL_000_220<tab>Welcome! When the satrap asked us to entertain a party of honored guests, I was wondering who it might be... This is a lovely surprise, to say the least.
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_MIHLEEL_000_220<tab>Welcome! When the satrap asked us to entertain a party of honored guests, I was wondering who it might be... This is a lovely surprise, to say the least.

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_MIHLEEL_000_221<tab>By the way, I heard all about Khalzahl from your friend G'raha Tia. I understand there was nothing that could be done, but...I was heartened to hear he meant us no harm.
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_MIHLEEL_000_221<tab>By the way, I heard all about Khalzahl from your friend G'raha Tia. I understand there was nothing that could be done, but...I was heartened to hear he meant us no harm.

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_MIHLEEL_000_222<tab>I cannot thank you enough for dispatching the beasts. As the smallest token of our thanks, your food and drink tonight are Mehryde's treat. Speaking of which, what shall I start you off with?
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_MIHLEEL_000_222<tab>I cannot thank you enough for dispatching the beasts. As the smallest token of our thanks, your food and drink tonight are Mehryde's treat. Speaking of which, what shall I start you off with?

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_Q3_000_223<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_Q3_000_223<tab>What will you say?

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_A3_000_224<tab>A piping hot mug of chai, please.
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_A3_000_224<tab>A piping hot mug of chai, please.

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_A3_000_225<tab>A glass of your finest local spirits!
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_A3_000_225<tab>A glass of your finest local spirits!

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_A3_000_226<tab>Water. Just water.
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_A3_000_226<tab>Water. Just water.

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_MIHLEEL_000_227<tab>As you wish. Pray join your friends, and I will bring you your drink.
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_MIHLEEL_000_227<tab>As you wish. Pray join your friends, and I will bring you your drink.

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_MIHLEEL_000_230<tab>Your drink is on its way. Please, have a seat.
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_MIHLEEL_000_230<tab>Your drink is on its way. Please, have a seat.

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_YSHTOLA_000_240<tab>Welcome back. Whatever did the Radiant want with you, pray tell?
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_YSHTOLA_000_240<tab>Welcome back. Whatever did the Radiant want with you, pray tell?

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_YSHTOLA_000_241<tab>Our allies have sent military delegates? That's news to me. Mind sharing the details?
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_YSHTOLA_000_241<tab>Our allies have sent military delegates? That's news to me. Mind sharing the details?

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_ALPHINAUD_000_250<tab>The Final Days─how far has the phenomenon spread, and how does it manifest itself in each land? I must reach out to my friends in each nation and find out all I can.
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_ALPHINAUD_000_250<tab>The Final Days─how far has the phenomenon spread, and how does it manifest itself in each land? I must reach out to my friends in each nation and find out all I can.

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_ALISAIE_000_255<tab>Ahhh...!
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_ALISAIE_000_255<tab>Ahhh...!

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_ALISAIE_000_256<tab>Well, I suppose I do feel better on a full stomach, after all. Burning skies? Blasphemies? Not if I've got anything to say about it!
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_ALISAIE_000_256<tab>Well, I suppose I do feel better on a full stomach, after all. Burning skies? Blasphemies? Not if I've got anything to say about it!

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_YSHTOLA_000_260<tab>If the Forum truly has been spurred to action by Hydaelyn's prophecy, then is it not odd that the Antitower was entrusted to Master Matoya, who bears them no love?
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_YSHTOLA_000_260<tab>If the Forum truly has been spurred to action by Hydaelyn's prophecy, then is it not odd that the Antitower was entrusted to Master Matoya, who bears them no love?

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_YSHTOLA_000_261<tab>No doubt She has a reason for this, and I would know what it is...
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_YSHTOLA_000_261<tab>No doubt She has a reason for this, and I would know what it is...

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_GRAHATIA_000_265<tab>Nothing like a feast to lift the spirits. I trust you enjoyed yourself as well?
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_GRAHATIA_000_265<tab>Nothing like a feast to lift the spirits. I trust you enjoyed yourself as well?

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_ESTINIEN_000_270<tab>Beasts and blasphemies may be running amok in nearby lands outside the influence of Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han and the alliance. If so, I may need to go hunting.
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_ESTINIEN_000_270<tab>Beasts and blasphemies may be running amok in nearby lands outside the influence of Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han and the alliance. If so, I may need to go hunting.

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_THANCRED_000_280<tab>Now, then...is there anything we've forgotten to mention? Are your arms and armor in good order?
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_THANCRED_000_280<tab>Now, then...is there anything we've forgotten to mention? Are your arms and armor in good order?

source: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_THANCRED_000_281<tab>In that case, it's time we each attended to our tasks. And when you arrive on the First, give my regards to Ryne. Tell her I miss her.
target: TEXT_AKTKMD110_04418_THANCRED_000_281<tab>In that case, it's time we each attended to our tasks. And when you arrive on the First, give my regards to Ryne. Tell her I miss her.
